newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Dec 24.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Dec 24.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Saudi Arabia and Egypt study the possibility of setting up a free trade zone for manufacturing. Raw materials would be sourced from both countries.
- Dallah Trading Company to set up an air conditioning factory with an initial investment of 25 million riyals.
- The Saudi Arabian Fertilizer Company signs a memorandum of understanding with the Italian Tecnimont SPA to build ammonia and urea production plants in Jubail.
- Saudi health minister to open 131 million riyal Huraimela Public Hospital.
- The Saudi Land Transport Company starts receiving one hundred trailers worth 20 million riyals to boost its fleet.
- Saudi Arabia's imports of barley in ten months reached 3.5 million tonnes.
- Yemen industry ministry to sell nine plants in Aden.
